trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType" /> object.
This enumeration contains all the possible return values for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.CollectionType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举包含所有可能的返回值为<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.CollectionType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It is used by the configuration system during run time to correctly merge configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: 它是由配置系统在过程中用于运行时正确合并配置设置。

trans-unit.source: It is also used when creating a custom class that extends <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 它还用时创建的自定义类来扩展<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>。

trans-unit.source: By default, the type of a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection> object is AddRemoveClearMap.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下的一种<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>对象是 AddRemoveClearMap。

trans-unit.source: If a BasicMap is required, override the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType.AddRemoveClearMap> property when extending <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType.BasicMap>.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要 BasicMap，重写<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType.AddRemoveClearMap>属性扩展时<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType.BasicMap>。

trans-unit.source: Collections of this type contain elements that can be merged across a hierarchy of configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 此类型的集合包含可在配置文件的层次结构中进行合并的元素。

trans-unit.source: At any particular level within such a hierarchy, <see langword="add" />, <see langword="remove" />, and <see langword="clear" /> directives are used to modify any inherited properties and specify new ones.
trans-unit.target: 在这类层次结构的任何特定级别中，均可使用 <see langword="add" />、<see langword="remove" /> 和 <see langword="clear" /> 指令修改任何继承的属性和指定新的属性。

trans-unit.source: Same as <see cref="F:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType.AddRemoveClearMap" />, except that this type causes the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection" /> object to sort its contents such that inherited elements are listed last.
trans-unit.target: 除了使 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection" /> 对象对其内容进行排序以将继承的元素排列在最后外，此类型与 <see cref="F:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType.AddRemoveClearMap" /> 相同。

trans-unit.source: Collections of this type contain elements that apply to the level at which they are specified, and to all child levels.
trans-unit.target: 此类型的集合包含应用于指定的级别（由这些元素指定）和所有子级别的元素。

trans-unit.source: A child level cannot modify the properties specified by a parent element of this type.
trans-unit.target: 子级别不能修改由此类型的父元素指定的属性。

trans-unit.source: Same as <see cref="F:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType.BasicMap" />, except that this type causes the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection" /> object to sort its contents such that inherited elements are listed last.
trans-unit.target: 除了使 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection" /> 对象对其内容进行排序以将继承的元素排列在最后外，此类型与 <see cref="F:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType.BasicMap" /> 相同。
